casebody.data:
Lawrence et al., Appellants, v. Edwin Shaw Hospital, Appellee.

[Cite as Lawrence v. Edwin Shaw Hosp. (1990), 50 Ohio St. 3d 601.]

(No. 89-262 Submitted February 7, 1990 Decided March 28, 1990.) James L. Wagner, for appellants. Lynn C. Slaby, prosecuting attorney, and John M. Prelac, for appellee.

This appeal is dismissed, sua spmte, as having been improvidently allowed.

Moyer, C.J., Sweeney, Holmes, Douglas, H. Brown and Resnick, JJ., concur. Wright, J., dissents. Wright, J., dissenting. I would affirm the judgment of the court of appeals.
